title: E-Commerce Web App
description: Developed a full-featured e-commerce platform with React, Redux, and Node.js, supporting authentication, product filters, and payment integration.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Designed a portfolio using Next.js and TailwindCSS to showcase projects and attract freelance clients.

title: Admin Dashboard
description: Created a responsive admin dashboard for internal analytics with charts, tables, and filters using React and Chart.js.

title: Blog Platform
description: Built a blog platform with Markdown support, user login, and comment system using MERN stack.

title: Social Media App
description: Developed a social media clone with real-time chat, image upload, and like/share functionalities using Socket.io and MongoDB.

title: Fitness Tracker App
description: A fitness tracking app built in React Native for iOS and Android, with step tracking and workout planning.

title: Online Learning Portal
description: Created an online learning portal for video lectures, quizzes, and certificate generation using Node.js and MongoDB.

title: Weather Forecast App
description: Built a weather app using React and OpenWeather API with forecast graphs and dynamic themes.

title: Finance Tracker
description: Developed a personal finance tracker to monitor income, expenses, and savings goals with charts and monthly reports.
